title: Design Autonomous Robot Architecture
description: Define the architecture for autonomous robots capable of exploration and resource extraction on asteroids and planets.

title: Develop Navigation and Control Algorithms
description: Create algorithms for autonomous navigation, obstacle avoidance, and resource extraction. This includes designing pathfinding strategies (such as A* or Dijkstra's), reaction controllers, and resource harvesting routines. The focus will also be on ensuring robustness to uncertainties, adaptability to dynamic environments, and energy efficiency.

title: Implement Resource Detection and Mapping System
description: Develop a system for detecting and mapping resources on asteroids and planets.

title: Create User Interface for Monitoring and Control
description: Develop a user interface for monitoring the status of robots, displaying resource maps, and controlling robot actions.

title: Establish Communication Protocols for Robots and Earth Stations
description: Develop communication protocols to enable data exchange between robots on asteroids/planets and Earth-based stations.

title: Assess Energy Storage and Propulsion Requirements
description: Evaluate energy storage and propulsion needs for the robots to operate efficiently on asteroids/planets.

title: Research and Select Extraction Technologies
description: Identify suitable extraction technologies for harvesting resources from asteroids/planets.
